overview: Lance Berks has 17 years experience in internet and telecommunications industries. Lance began his career in telecommunications in 1994 as Vice President of Business Development for Teljoy, a South African GSM service provider. There he was responsible for developing the region’s first chain of retail outlets for mobile phones. Subsequently, Lance held senior business development roles at Internet Solutions, Africa’s largest ISP, acquired by Dimension Data, and OzEmail Interline, a NASDAQ listed Australian company, Lance was instrumental in expanding the VoIP affiliate program at OzEmail Interline, which was acquired by MCI WorldCom in 1999. Lance founded Holly Connects soon after, and since then has worked as CEO to extend the company from its Australian roots into a global organization, with offices in Sydney, London, and head office in Boston, MA. Holly Connects develops and delivers an innovative world class call automations software product and associated services, automating over 2B minutes. Holly Connects was acquired by West Corporation in June 2010. Lance resides in Boston, Massachusetts.
